attributes.name: Featured Image
attributes.summary:
The Featured Image Field is a versatile component that allows you to easily add and customize images in your application. Whether you need to display a simple image or a more detailed presentation with captions and credits, this component has you covered.

Key Features
- Image Display: Add an image by providing its URL. The component will handle the rest.
- Accessibility: Include alternative text for images to ensure accessibility for all users.
- Captions and Credits: Add descriptive captions and credits to your images for better context and attribution.
- Flexible Sizing: Choose how your image is displayed with options like actual, contain, or cover.
- Custom Dimensions: Specify exact dimensions for your image to fit your design needs.

Display Options
- Simple View: Display your image with basic styling.
- Detailed View: Use the embedded option to include captions and credits, making your images more informative.
